attributes.description: Detect suspicious systemd units on Linux, excluding system paths but flagging user-writable directories and unusual locations
attributes.query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  description, 
  load_state, 
  active_state, 
  sub_state, 
  fragment_path, 
  unit_file_state 
FROM systemd_units 
WHERE fragment_path NOT LIKE '/lib/systemd/%' 
  AND fragment_path NOT LIKE '/usr/lib/systemd/%' 
  AND (
    fragment_path LIKE '/tmp/%' 
    OR fragment_path LIKE '/home/%' 
    OR fragment_path LIKE '/var/tmp/%'
  ) 
  AND (id LIKE '%.service' OR id LIKE '%.timer') 
  AND (unit_file_state = 'enabled' OR active_state = 'active') 
ORDER BY id 
LIMIT 100;
